name: @aragon/kits-bare
description: Generic kit for deploying and setting up a DAO with one app
author: Aragon One AG <contact@aragon.one>

scripts.publish:rpc: apm publish BareKit --init $(npm run deploy:fac:rpc | tail -n 1) @ARAGON_ENS
scripts.deploy:fac:rpc: aragon contracts compile && aragon contracts exec scripts/deploy-dao-factory.js
